creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: two lines of precisely written characters against brown paper with black flecks
inscription: 琹棋書画時儁酒 / 雪月風華日煮茶 (When enjoying music, chess, poetry and painting, bring wine; / When there is moonlight on the snow or wind in the flower, drink tea.) (SA)
markings: URC and LLQ: 鐡斎 (Tessai); b: 岡道節 (Oka dō setsu); c: 鼑卿 (Kaitei)
signed: lower quadrant: 書於居易書院 (Sho ni oite Kyoi Shoin ); 鉄斎處士富節 (Tessai shoshi fusetsu)
title: Wine and Tea
